item.title: Using Caddy v2's reverse proxy feature with a domain managed with Cloudflare!
item.description: Caddy version 2.0.0 released on May 4th 2020. Caddy brands itself as “The Ultimate Server” with functionality including a web server, reverse proxy, automatic certificate renewal, automatic HTTPS and more! I have to say, it’s pretty awesome! 👍 This blog post will show you how to use the Caddy v2 reverse proxy feature with a domain managed with Cloudflare. So, lets jump in! 😄 Caddyfile Caddy uses a Caddyfile for it’s configuration.
